main.name: Jason
main.bio: Currently, I'm a 3rd year Computer Science student at Simon Fraser University. I'm on the hunt for a software development internship in 2023. I'm passionate about problem-solving and love using programming to do it. I look forward to working with like-minded people and taking on big responsibility. I have worked with a variety of tools such as Git, AWS (Elastic Beanstalk, CloudFront, S3, Relational Database Service, Route53, Amazon Certificate Manager), mySQL, JUnit, Maven, Postman, Figma and Balsamiq. I am familiar with Java (Spring Boot), C, C++, Python, JavaScript (ReactJS), Typescript(Angular), SQL, MATLAB, HTML and CSS.

resume.skillmessage: I'm familiar with a wide variety of technologies

projects.title: Bijou Budget
projects.description: Bijou Budget is an intuitive budget tracking application implemented using ReactJS, Java Spring Boot and mySQL. Deployed using AWS, this website guides users in keeping track of all their monthly expenses and transactions.

projects.title: Galactic Grease Monkey
projects.description: An exciting 2D, arcade game in which the user must navigate around black holes, aliens & satellites to collect diamonds and spaceship parts to win the game.

projects.title: Three Card Poker
projects.description: An implementation of three card poker. Follow the link to the read me for an indepth description.

projects.title: Weather & Traffic App
projects.description: Hosted on PythonAnywhere, this script uses the Twilio API to send daily SMS texts to my phone summarizing todayâ€™s weather and traffic time for the route to my university. Weather is retrieved via the OpenWeatherMap API and traffic time is determined through the TrueWay Directions API.

projects.title: My Personal Website
projects.description: This current website you are viewing was developed in ReactJS and deployed using Github Pages. The contact form makes use of the EmailJS library to provide a seamless user experience.
